comment._content:
Caption appears to be,

" J. P. Morgan in London 20 years ago"

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A somewhat similar photo of Morgan, at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3b40359 , has a copyright registration date of 1902. I'm not certain, but I think the photo here is probably earlier. The "20 years ago" could well be relative to his death in 1913.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
I agree swang that the pic shown here looks like it is earlier.  That 1902 pic shows his hair a bit sparser, and a bit whiter.

Although with Morgan's known aversion to having his photographic portrait made due to the problem with his schnozzola, it's quite possible either or both have been retouched in the nose area.  Possibly other areas too.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll adjust the title to reflect what it says on the negative and reload the description to Flickr.
